TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeParameterWriter extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter
Public MustInherit Class MimeParameterWriter Inherits MimeFormatter

summary.span: 為輸出要求參數的寫入器提供通用基底實作，這些參數用於透過 HTTP (但不使用 SOAP) 實作之 Web 服務用戶端。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for writers of out-going request parameters for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 類別建立成 HTTP 要求資料流的用戶端撰寫的 Web 方法參數的一般要求寫入格式。The class establishes a common request-writing format for client-side writing of Web method parameters into HTTP request streams. 您通常不需要使用或其直接下階的類別。You will typically not need to use or its descendant classes directly. 相反地，當 Wsdl.exe 工具產生用戶端 proxy 程式碼，根據 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 的實作，它會套用每個 Web 方法，並設定屬性的適當類型的屬性。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to the appropriate type.

param.name: url
param.span: HTTP 要求的原始統一資源定位器 (URL)。

span.span: The HTTP request's original Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

param.name: parameters
param.span: 必要時要加入 URL 的 Web 方法參數值。

span.span: The Web method parameter values to be added to the URL, if necessary.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會修改外送 HTTP 要求的統一資源定位器 (URL)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, modifies the outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).

returns.span: 物件，包含修改之外送 HTTP 要求的統一資源定位器 (URL)。

span.span: A object that contains the modified, outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自的，則只修改 HTTP 要求的 URL。Of the classes derived from , only modifies the HTTP request URL.

span.span: The out-going request, where the class allows transport protocols besides HTTP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自的，則只實作方法。Of the classes derived from , only implements the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定將參數寫入 HTTP 要求所使用的編碼方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

value.span: 將參數寫入 HTTP 要求所使用的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼方式，所表示的類別，定義如何將字元轉換成位元組序列。An encoding, as represented by the class, defines how to transform characters into a sequence of bytes.

Public Overridable ReadOnly Property UsesWriteRequest As Boolean
public: virtual property bool UsesWriteRequest { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 Web 方法參數值是否要序列化為輸出 HTTP 要求主體。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body.

value.span: 如果 Web 方法參數值要序列化為輸出 HTTP 要求主題，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否叫用方法。The property determines whether the method is invoked. 類別的實作傳回值的`false`。The class's implementation of returns a value of `false`. 只有衍生類別會覆寫是，其實作傳回值的`true`。The only derived class that overrides is , whose implementation returns a value of `true`.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, serializes Web method parameter values into a stream representing the outgoing HTTP request body.
